item.title: Baudrillard - a brief introducion - thenandnow
item.description: #internetContent #philosophy/postmodernism/baudrillard #keyConcepts #article Article link: An Introduction to Baudrillard - Then & Now related notes: [[Baudrillard’s Simulacra and Simulation]] [[Baudrillard - The System of Objects]] An Introduction to Baudrillard ‘We live in a world where there is more and more information, and less and less meaning’.

item.title: Baudrillard - The System of Objects
item.description: #internetContent #keyConcepts #philosophy/postmodernism/baudrillard Article link: related notes: [[Postmodernism key concepts]], [[Semiotics key concepts]] [[Poststructuralism key concepts]] [[Baudrillard’s Simulacra and Simulation]] The system of objects is a concept in poststructuralism and postmodernism that refers to the way in which objects are imbued with meaning and value within a particular cultural context.
